datasource: Pillinger, Steve, and Letiwa Galboran. 1999. A Rendille dictionary: Including a grammatical outline and an English-Rendille Index. Cushitic Language Studies, vol. 14 . Köln: Köppe Verlag. abbrev. PG99
geodemoTXT: Varieties and subdialects of Rendille are spoken in Kenya, between Lake Turkana and Mt. Marsabit.

termclusters.label: ren-PronounClitic
termclusters.note: PG99p.40 :: masc clitic normally has k - goes_to h / __ V (i.e.,is homophonous w. plural)

termclusters.label: ren-Verb-fur-M2PerfectNegative
termclusters.note: PG99pp.47-52 :: Passive forms  of fur- are mostly extrapolated from Pillinger-Galboran1999 pp. 47- 52;in text (p. 52) only imperf indic aff and neg given.
